Package strategy

Class Aggresive

  • java.lang.Object
    • strategy.PlayerStrategy
      • strategy.Aggresive
  • public class Aggresive
extends PlayerStrategy
    concrete strategy class of Aggressive player. An aggressive computer player strategy that focuses on centralization of forces and then attack, i.e. it deploys on its strongest country, then always attack with its strongest country, then moves its armies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country.

    • Method Detail

      • createOrder

        public Orders createOrder()
        this function creates orders keeping in mind how the aggressive player plays. it uses a switch case to create any random order(move armies, deploy armies, advance armies, cards) deploys on its strongest country attack with its strongest country moves its armies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country
        Specified by:
        createOrder in class PlayerStrategy
        Returns:
        order of a strategy type to be executed
